website_summaries.verdict: Strong, sturdy wood hangers that can handle any clothing.
pros: These smooth-finish slim hangers save space in your closet
Strong enough to hold winter coats
cons: These are a bit pricier than some other brands

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good all around hanger
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one pack, thought "these are pretty solid". Ordered two more. Very sturdy, not one broken. Quality build and appearance. If you're looking at cheaper hangers you're rolling the dice. The rod isn't super slick but it's not exactly non-slip, either. Pants hang fine but you'll need to balance the weight with the hip higher than the legs. No big deal. Some have asked about coats. These hangers will hold most coats except heavy winter coats. Modern winter coats made with new, lighter insulating tech will probably be fine. For heavier coats and suit jackets with a structured shoulder, I suggest the J.S. Hanger Extra Wide Rounded Shoulders hangers, which are also good.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Some of the hangers didn't even have finish on them... They were just rough wood. What a joke
customer_reviews.author: Biz

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy the BLACK hangers (they make a MESS)
customer_reviews.text: The lower "pant-bar" is not "sanded down" as described in the product photos and is in fact coated in what appears to be black paint that flakes off very easily and leaves behind a huge mess. Initially I loved these hangers and thought they were great until I discovered this problem. I actually bought two sets to use for my entire closet, but now that I've discovered this issue I'm returning them. I will probably buy a different set from the same manufacturer (assuming the other colors don't have the same problem).
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Slow down, quality is slipping
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers, have bought them for years, although the latest batch seems to have a quality control issue, they don’t hang level with each other, some of the metal parts are off centered So they don’t hang evenly, the cut out space were women’s clothes hang lingerie from are in various positions, thank China need to slow down a little bit, or take Sunday off to rest and recoup.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: look very nice in the closet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fashion conscious son. He loves the way they look and if they suit him, they must be nice since he is so particular! I've checked them out and they seem to be high quality. I'm not aware of any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Keller A.

customer_reviews.title: I was really disappointed given the substantial price
customer_reviews.text: These are cheaply made with a poorly applied finish that unevenly coated the hangers and emitted a strong chemical smell. I was really disappointed given the substantial price.
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Snazzy Hangers to class up the joint
customer_reviews.text: I really like these hangers. I wanted a darker finish for my soon to be renovated walk in closet. I like these hangers so much that I have just ordered my 3 set. I also ordered the wide shoulder hangers and those are pretty swell also, especially for knit blouses or lacey cold shoulder blouses. I did receive on hanger broken (probably in shipping). I asked for a replacement or refund for that one hanger and I was promptly refunded the fair single hanger price. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice hangers but cheaper options available
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these along with another set that were ~$10 cheaper. The quality was pretty comparable between the two so I ended up returning these and going with the cheaper option to fill my closet. These are very nice hangers but I was looking to buy 8+ sets so the price difference ended up being pretty significant for me.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to plastic hangers!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished building out our small master closet and I didn’t want to use mismatched or plastic hangers of all different shapes and sizes in this beautiful new closet. So we used wall mounts from Home Depot to mount the closet rods on and these hangers fit perfect with them. Perfect distance from wall as well as they way they hang on the 1 1/2” dia rods. Its nice to be able to have all our clothes look neat and orderly. Pants do not slip on the hanger due to the grip on the dowel across the bottom of the hanger. These seem like they will last a long time. We just order more for our guest closet as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Robison

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this set of hangers I have for the past three years now and so far they have been withstanding the test of time. I've never had one crack or break completely. The only issue I've run into with maybe 2 hangers out of the 80 or so that I have is that the hook actually detached from the hanger. I was able to repair this fairly easily, but just something worth noting if you are thinking about using them for very heavy clothing. Other than that, they definitely level up your closet aesthetic and for about $1.50 a piece, I think it's worth every penny as opposed to flimsy plastic hangers.
customer_reviews.author: dabbio

customer_reviews.title: I love these hangers
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers. They are way prettier than wire or plastic. The wood, being thicker, keeps your clothes from being smashed and wrinkled from being too close together. The hangers are a little less than half an inch thick. The wire hook on top swivels so you can hang your clothing from a door or other object while you are getting dressed. The rod that stretches across the bottom is coated with a thin plastic to keep from snagging your clothing. Overall, for those of us that prefer a nicer, more organized looking closet, these hangers do the job and look nice while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Beard

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not a color match to the wide shoulder versions
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Retro set to match the wide shoulder hangers JS Hanger also sells. They are definitely decent hangers for the price. However, the color match to the wide shoulder hangers is not very similar. These are a few shades darker. I even purchased multiple sets of these and none of them are simular to the wide hangers. I’m not sure if they are made of different wood and they don’t take the stain as well or if they use a completely different stain for these. I would much prefer the wide hangers color, but these will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: gh0st

customer_reviews.title: ok hangers
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price, some surfaces were rough and thus needed to be sandpapered, however did discolor the wood slightly. Also the edges for the cutouts to hang straps are pretty sharp and rough so shirts keep getting caught on them when sliding on.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great Finish and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Decided to pay a little extra for these and glad we did. The non-slip on the bar is perfect in opinion... not too grabby (like dry cleaner hangers) and not too slick, well balanced. It does state that the hangers are 360 swivel. However, the ones I received did not seem to want to turn. Maybe there is a trick to it, but his was not the main reason for purchase and no big deal for us. The size of the hangers is also a plus for us as it hangs our clothes well. We already have several different brands, colors of other wooden hangers and these blended and matched well in the closet. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TheITGuyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I had purchased a few sets of soemthing like this from Ikea
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a few sets of soemthing like this from Ikea, needed more and wanted them to match. These were VERY close, and a LOT cheaper + saved me the trip to the store. Of the 20 or so a few didn't have the best build quality, slight splitting of the wood where the hook connects, but its a hanger nothing anyone but me would ever notice. All and all very happy for the price would by again... actually I already did even after these 20 hangers wouldn't you know I needed like 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues
customer_reviews.text: Bought 20 of these to see if I liked them. I did. I bought 40 more. One was unusable because the pant holder was unattached one one side. Two to three others were severely bowed. Nice hangers for the price if they could get quality control right
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Build quality has gone down
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these hangers several times in the past. With this latest purchase, however, the build quality has gone down. Some of the hangers have scraped wood bits, the pant bars are slightly bent and nailed poorly, the wood isn't shiny in all parts. Overall, they are still better than other wooden hangers I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what to to expect when I bought these but I am very pleased. These are really nice hangers. What a great deal it was for the price. They also come in a nice box to store the extras. I really recommend these. When I need hangers again I will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Not like the other ones I purchased
customer_reviews.text: The hook portion is now smaller than it used to be and the finish lighter. This is the third time I have purchased this item over the course of two years and they just seem cheaper looking than the older hangers.
customer_reviews.author: MLP

customer_reviews.title: Good hangers for the money
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are reasonably solid. Not light like some lower end hangers but not as heavy as my Laura Ashley's ones. All hangers received well packed and without any dents so that was good. Only one or two hangers didn't have the smooth finish I expect. The hangers are actually straight and not curved like my LA ones. All in all pretty decent for the cost but I would prefer higher-quality hangers that I could feel from the store.
customer_reviews.author: James.T

customer_reviews.title: Love these hangers
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers. I wasn't sure how they would be so bought 100 the first time because the price was very reasonable, they were so great for everything from my dainty tops to heavy winter coats. I bought 3 hundred more. Now every closet has these beautiful wood hangers. They are wonderful. One type hanger for all my and my husband's needs.
customer_reviews.author: starhealer

customer_reviews.title: Hook too small - returned
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are the type that have a small hook at the top and do not fit well over standard closet rod. They were too snug and were clumsy to remove from the rod as well as slide back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: TPP

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These hangers have worked very well. I have not encountered any of the quality issues mentioned by others. These give my closet a much higher class look and seem to treat my clothes better than the plastic hangers I've been using. We are current in the process of swapping out our old plastic hangers for these. Great product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Graveyyy

customer_reviews.title: Good for children and small women's clothing
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are okay: 1) They are wide enough to fit a small woman's garments, but not wide enough for mens size M and up -- unless you dont mind the crease/poke in your shirts formed from the end of the hanger not reaching through to the sleeve. 2) I hear snagging of material when I slide them into my shirts so they are not smoothly sanded. I originally bought them for my 5'4 self. My shirts fit well along the shoulder width, but I mostly use them to hang up slacks and pants due to the snagging. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: Not happy about this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hangers for the "non-slip" and they do not work. They will barley hold a pair of jeans without sliding off. For my slacks and golf pants, I had to cut the non-slip off my dry cleaning wire hangers and rig up my new hangers to make it work. Not happy about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D.

customer_reviews.title: Can't get much better than this
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are gorgeous. The wood is beautiful up close and they have a great quality feel to them. I have purchased two sets of these to replace my plastic hangers and now my closet looks substantially better. There really is a noticeable improvement in the overall aesthetic appeal of my closet. Also when I go to grab my clothing off the rack it is significantly more satisfying to touch these wood hangers than the plastic ones that tend to flex when grabbed. Overall I love these hangers and I am certain these will last me years.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Herrera

customer_reviews.title: I was happy to find this set did not have any of ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews on other wooden hanger sets, I was happy to find this set did not have any of the issues I saw other brand consumers come across. The wood did not have any splinters or pieces hanging or breaking off. The finish was very smooth. All of the hangers have the same look and color of wood, so they all match very well. The hangers are durable and strong. I ordered one set and as soon as I got, I ordered another. Looking to buy another set or 2 to completely update my closet. These hangers keep my clothes looking nice and they really upgrade the look of my wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Redington

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stylish and classy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hangers. They're great for my husbands work pants. The only thing I was disappointed in was that I was thinking that a suit coat would fit nicely on it (to keep the set together) and it's just too thin to properly hold up and keep the suit jacket nice. These really only work for pants and shirts. Nice product and I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: these things stink like no other
customer_reviews.text: As another review mentioned, these things stink like no other. The hangar itself seems to be solid, but these have been airing out 1.5 months and they still smell awful, basically unusable. Should have returned them right away but figured the smell would go away.
customer_reviews.author: Debo5

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These are the cheapest made product. Solid wood ? Solid b.s. for sure. Will shop else where.
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: We own a couple hundred of these hangers and they’re great. Man our closets look wonderful and our clothes are so well taken care of by these
customer_reviews.author: Tonya murray

customer_reviews.title: Quality Wooden Hangers
customer_reviews.text: These wooden hangers are gorgeous. I just took all of the plastic hangers out of our coat closet and replaced them with these. They give the closet a smart and uniformly organized quality that I was hoping to achieve. I purchased another brand at a store in our town. It wasn't until I got them home that I noticed that the bottom portion wasn't stained evenly. They also had rough edges. They are going back very soon. Great product. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Film Viewer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Worth the extra money. Just ordered a second set.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hangers. You will see similar products for less money but the extra cost here is worth it for the quality. Unlike the cheaper hangers I got on Amazon these are very smooth! The cross bar has a thin plastic tube around the wood (barely noticeable) to ensure that even delicate pants won't catch a snag. I ordered another set. All hangers in the package were perfect. No defects. Highly recommend. I bought these because of the positive reviews so I feel it's my responsibility to confirm they are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa H. Stram

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they made me want to stare happily into my closet for a while... so I did!
customer_reviews.text: I've never really been a hanger person...they're odd looking little fellas that hold clothes and no one ever sees them in your closet anyways... but I'm sold on these! Just having these hangers is motivation to organize my formerly messy closet, they are that gorgeous! They're a medium to dark brown wood with a smooth, glossy finish that won't snag my clothes and are even durable enough to hold my heavy winter sweaters and coats! I also love the little indents on each end to hold my strappy dresses and summer tanks. My mismatched plastic hanger collection is off to the donation box!
customer_reviews.author: The Sarah Bear

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, zero broken, bent or dented hangers thanks to the build quality and very robust packaging. These have an excellent finish on both the metal and wood portions that is smooth and nonabrasive on clothing. The hooks rotate smoothly without unscrewing or squeaking. These are a luxury item I didn't realize I cared about until i got them and I will not be going back to plastic or wire hangars ever. Smoothly sliding clothing on and off them and having confidence in their construction is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: GuardianReflex

customer_reviews.title: Good Hanger
customer_reviews.text: A hanger is a hanger, sort of. Target sold shirt hangers in a style I loved, but I could never find them again (and wish I ordered more). So this time I ordered twice what I needed from the description online. The arrived and are nice quality, and work great. (No complaints) Note: The hangers I wish I could have found were ones with no slip texture on the tips. If I found them now, I would just stay with the ones from Amazon, they work good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Matzke

customer_reviews.title: Hanger work great. All were in good shape and good quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Hanger work great. All were in good shape and good quality for the price. Veay good sturdy hangers especially for heavy sweater and coats and do not break as plastic hangers do. Great wood look without paying a lot !
customer_reviews.author: TAO ZHANG

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers! I originally bought them for coats since the plastic ones couldn't hold their weight. Since I have bought four sets and plan on four more to replace all of the hangers in the house. They do have a varnish smell when they first come in but I leave them out in an open room for a day and its gone. They hold clothes really well and look great in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Dibble

customer_reviews.title: Check the fit of the hanger to your closet pole.
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved to a furnished apartment and none of these hangars fit on a standard closet rod installed. They were too small and could not use. I have now had to buy other hangers that are slightly larger. I would highly recommend verifying the diameter of your pole.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Roosli

customer_reviews.title: Really cool hangers. I love the wood color and design
customer_reviews.text: Really cool hangers. I love the wood color and design, and since Im buying some expensive clothes Might as well use these awesome looking hangers instead of those plastic ones. In my opinion, it looks really good in my closet with my clothes and even my mom was shocked haha.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Reading some of the reviews, I was a little hesitant buying these hangers. I am so glad that I decided to buy them. I have purchased 6 of them. Every package I was very careful to remove all packaging to make sure nothing would break. Every time I received a package it turned out great! They hang my shirts perfect and my slacks perfect. If you want to put an upgrade to your closet, switch out your wire/plastic/velvet hangers with this guy.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Overall they are good quality and I have place 3 different orders for ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall they are good quality and I have place 3 different orders for them. One strange this is that there seems to always be 1 hanger in each set that the dowel that runs across the bottom breaks shortly after purchase, so I would consider it a set of 19
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed. The bar attaches to the hanger with ...
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat disappointed. The bar attaches to the hanger with one small nail on each side and it's off center on about half of the hangers. The edge of the bar is also roughly cut on a few of the hangers. They seem to be holding up pretty well so far and look a lot better than mismatched plastic hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M

customer_reviews.title: reasonably priced luxury
customer_reviews.text: Great hangers. My husband wanted wooden hangers because his suits kept breaking the flimsy plastic tubular hangers I buy in mass quantities. He loves them and uses them for even his jeans and t-shirts. I must admit, they make his closet look nice and fancy, as opposed to my closet with all my mismatched tubular hangers, but I can't replace the hangers in 7 people's closets with wooden ones...but this is a nice luxury for him at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!  So pleased!  Neighbors and friends are so impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Great hangers keep our clothes and us looking great! High quality, smoothly finished and sturdy! Reasonable price. Threw out broken and bent flimsy wire and plastic hangers and replaced forty of them with these classy new wooden ones that look and function with elegance and style.
customer_reviews.author: John Murray

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE HANGERS
customer_reviews.text: I received these hangers a few days ago and I was very pleased. They can wrapped in a pack of ten and both bundles was wrap in plastic. None was broken or damaged. The wooden hangers are about 17 1/4 to 17 1/2 inches long and they will support heavy leathers jackets and leather vest. The support bar or pants bar all was attached and the hangers was smooth and did not have any smell. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: TN-Will

customer_reviews.title: I know this is corny, but NO MORE WIRE HANGERS!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality - no snags on the wood. I have been buying a couple of sets a year to gradually replace all of my mismatched hangers. Get the ones with the plastic ribbing around the horizontal piece so that your pants will not slip off. Strong enough for the heaviest winter coat.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Normal

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Already changing everything in my husband’s closet over to these. He loves them and the pant hangers too. They are sturdy enough to hang full Harley riding leathers on without concern and our coats are HEAVY. . Well made and love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Robin C Rush

customer_reviews.title: The reason that for you to buy
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are nice and sturdy, and they are perfect for coats and jackets , not like the plastic or metal thin hangers that bend easily... And these hangars are very good quality for the price. The only problem i found is that now I want to replace all my cheap plastic hangars with these! And i also bought one for my aunt , she likes it and changed all her plastic hangers. it was the great buy , worth to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund zhang

customer_reviews.title: Poor finish considering the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality finish considering how expensive these are. Dont waste your money on these. Just get another brand if you want wooden ones.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Liddy

customer_reviews.title: Similar to older Amazon Choice branded hangers. Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I have older Amazon hangers but when I went to reorder them the quality didn't look as good as the ones I own. That lead me to this brand of hanger. Matches the older, nicer Amazon ones. These are finished well and are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Retro color has changed
customer_reviews.text: Bought 250 of these earlier this year and needed more, but retro color has changed...much lighter. Disappointed, but guess some clothes probably really need to go.
customer_reviews.author: P&DB

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 2 sets of these. Very nice looking hangers in the closet. They aren't the best hangers every, but very good for the price. I did get one that had a defect on it in my 2nd batch. Cracked/rough/splintered. I won't use it as it would definitely snag clothes. But it's still a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hangers
customer_reviews.text: I just made the upgrade to wooden hangers now that I have a larger, open closet. These feel well made and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie D

customer_reviews.title: I've tried a few different brands and these have been the best! I've ordered a fair number of sets and ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently converted my closet to purely wooden hangers. I've tried a few different brands and these have been the best! I've ordered a fair number of sets and have only received a handful of damaged hangers (nothing that would not let me use the item, just small imperfections). Overall I'm very satisfied and will continue to replenish with these hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Quintanilla

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are excellent. They are beautiful and keep my closet elegant. It made of solid hardwood and very good sturdy quality. The non-slip shoulder work well with my sweaters and top, and the non-slip rod work well with our pants. The best part is the quality, perfect to hang the heavy winter coat, much better than my plastic one. the price is good for the quality delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Z.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, Sturdy Hangers
customer_reviews.text: My headline says it all. They work well and are made well. Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Best hangers out there!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are terrific. I’ve had them for years and never had a single problem. I’ll never buy from another source.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Rice

customer_reviews.title: no slip grips have become loose and are now practically useless.
customer_reviews.text: nail stuck through and nearly punctured expensive slacks, no slip grips have become loose and are now practically useless.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These walnut hangers are amongst the best hangers that I have used so far. The only problem is, like all hangers with metal hooks, is that there may be screeching when sliding across your wardrobe bar (varies on the material of your bar), so be mindful of that. The body of the hangers are sturdy, but the attachment of the metal hook may come a bit loose sometimes. There is also slight variation between the shape of the hooks from hanger to hanger (quality control issue), but overall, it's an amazing hanger. Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Nice hanger
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers. They fit clothing nicely and look great in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed in them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these hangers in walnut and another set with the clips. Both sets were wood and colored walnut and they didn't match. I thought same stain and same brand they would match. I was a little disappointed in them.
customer_reviews.author: Tumbleweed

customer_reviews.title: Low build quality: warp, and easily breaks. Looks nice. Expensive for build quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple warp, or break. I'd understand if this product was 2/3rd the price, but I expect more for this price. Looks nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Tuananh Vo

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: These are the nicest hangers for coats. They have a protective bar for slacks and they when coats and suit jackets are hung they look so nice in the closest. The garments hang on them so straight and look beautiful in the closet. What a great design and with a great look.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Hangars are very sturdy and work great for all of my button down shirts. The notches help to keep my shirts from sliding. I also really like that the hooks at the top are movable, so I can easily put everything into my closet going the same direction; even if I put the shirts on the other direction in the laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Dilly

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I learned about these hangers through a YouTube video, and am very happy I did. High quality, love them. Unable to assess durability since I have only have seen using them for a few days. I plan on purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: zugnut

customer_reviews.title: Quality cherry colored hangers
customer_reviews.text: Upscale hangers worth the extra price, if you have a wardrobe closet then these are the hangers to match. Dont be caught rockin some cheap knockoffs, these instantly upgrade your gear....now if there was some way to not have to take my dry cleaning off metal and transfer to these everytime that would be magic.
customer_reviews.author: Trusted Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money but needs more sanding.
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 star if the little indents in the top were also sanded down and smooth. It actually gave me a splinter while I was handling it before I realized how rough they were.
customer_reviews.author: Ape

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful strong hangers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hangers! They’re strong and look great! A much better choice than plastic hangers!
customer_reviews.author: EncinitasMom

customer_reviews.title: Find better hangers elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: The hangers are fine for dress shirts but the rod to hang pants on is awful. The paint for the black hangers keeps coming off and leaving black paint chips all over my closet and clothes. If you want quality, don’t go for these
customer_reviews.author: robrob

customer_reviews.title: Finally a hanger worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for years at wooden hangers and never found any that seemed worth the money (flimsy, rough, just plain cheap......). I took a chance on these a couple of months ago and am thrilled with the quality and price. I am in the process of ridding my house of plastic hangers and now include a set of these in each of my Amazon orders - and will until all the plastic is gone!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, color is as shown, and I really like that the “bar” part has ribbed casing so that your pants won’t fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Solid build quality, had no issues with roughness, ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid build quality, had no issues with roughness, splinters, etc. Planning to buy another volley in the near future. As an aside, my shirts are all XXL-Tall and these hangars are plenty wide enough to handle them without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Third set I have ordered. Excellent hangers
customer_reviews.text: Based on earlier reviews, I was a little reluctant to order these hangers. But being pretty picky I pushed ahead and figured I would give them a try. The hangers are excellent. Other hangers on the market have a tendency to be rough and snag golf shirts and other garments, but these ones Are terrific. Excellent quality for the price, and that is the reason I have just ordered my third set. I hope you find this Review Helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: YIKES! Hangers were in terrible condition and caused my skin to break out.
customer_reviews.text: First off, there were scratches, indentations and inconsistencies in the craftsmanship. Additionally, there was excess stain or finish on one of the hangers and caused a rash to break out on my skin. I do not recommend this seller. Expecting a full refund and potential medial expenses.
customer_reviews.author: The Mut Google

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Solid. As other reviews have pointed out, I, too, have found a few rough spots on a select few. Personally, this doesn't bother me, or any of my clothes, but may be of concern to those with more delicate materials. Still, nothing that couldn't be fixed with some light sanding. Overall, for the price, these are a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Very sturdy well made. Will buy again. 20 per pack was perfect. Other sellers online were selling cheaper hangers with much less per package.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty surprisingly to find out this J
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty surprisingly to find out this J.S. Hanger with clips. This is a recommendation from a friend. My new clothes is building up like a hill this year. I don't have enough space for my clothes since I have a small closet. It's pretty cool to purchase sets of this, and I love its color matching my house wooden floor. The U-shape grooved bar & clips helps me out for giving more space to my closet. There's difference between this wood made and the plastic one I used to have. Its material is strong enough for heavy duty. It's definately a quality item you should have in your closet.
customer_reviews.author: hui

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Best ones on the market
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality... sturdy and well built. Stain is a little splotchy
customer_reviews.author: Txgunnut45

customer_reviews.title: they quality is good and the price is reasonable
customer_reviews.text: They're hangers, they hang stuff, they quality is good and the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: BTKD

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Cost more than other wood hangers in their class, but feel very sturdy and look great. Life it too short to have your clothes fall on the floor when your cheap hangers break. I'll buy these in the future as needed. Costs more than the bargain basement hangers but are worth it in my opinion. Shipped in a very large box and arrived undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Baty

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: The paint chips off and gets EVERYWHERE! it’s a mess to clean up and you find paint chips everywhere even after you think you’ve cleaned it all up. Only going to get worse, so now I have to replace all my hangers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but after purchasing I noticed you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, but after purchasing I noticed you can get the same great quality in these hangers from ikea for a ton less.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable wood hangers.
customer_reviews.text: These are OK hangers. I wish they were about 2 inches longer or the top part made and upward arch over the lower rod though. My pants love to get hung up on the top part when trying to hang them and get wrinkled. That is annoying. Other than that they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Halstead

customer_reviews.title: I am really impressed with these hangers.
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with these hangers. They arrived quickly and had no damage (always a plus). I would recommend these as a great way to dress up your closet and gain that added strength to keep your close hanging straight to avoid sagging and wrinkling. Also, the construction of these are well built.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G.

customer_reviews.title: Look great and have held up very nicely. Quality!
customer_reviews.text: High quality. I will be replacing all of my hangers with these.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Hoivik

customer_reviews.title: My closet looks great now
customer_reviews.text: I hate having different hangers so I have purchased about 200 already. I will be purchasing again real soon after shopping a little more for clothes
customer_reviews.author: yessenia fajardo

customer_reviews.title: A bit rough, some cracked/brittle areas
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not the best quality, but if you're on a shoestring budget, they get the job done. A few in the pack may be too rough to use, so be careful. Not "High Grade," whatever that means.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: You need quality control inspections prior to shipping
customer_reviews.text: I am returning 21 defective hangers. They are not straight and the bar is crooked. Some are not smooth either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: basic wood hanger - beats plastic
customer_reviews.text: Solid hangers not likely to break like plastic, quieter and non tangling compared to wire hangers. plastic no skid cover on cross bar is nice but we haven't checked if they hold pants better - but expect better than slick plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie W. Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Adds class to your close
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been great. I purchased them during a lightning sale and replaced some old wire and plastic hangers and these are sturdy and give some class to the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These are great they look good and hold up had them for about 2 years this is my second purchase
customer_reviews.author: Shane Cutrer

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade over plastic hangers.
customer_reviews.text: The hangers had a nice wood smell to it upon opening, and they work well with dress shirts and suits. Definitely a good upgrade from plastic hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Mendez

customer_reviews.title: These are super nice. I bought the target ones without the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are super nice. I bought the target ones without the divots but wanted some with, and these were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Product
customer_reviews.text: The hangers look decent and are well made. All joints are firm and have no gap. The most important to me is that the color looks consistent from one to the other hangers. I've purchased packs of hangers from other stores and the color is always different among hangers in the pack. Some people may not care but I do. These hangers have no this problem and make my closet much better looking. I'll buy more to replace all my hangers. The price well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray. W.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and beautiful appearance
customer_reviews.text: It's the little things that let me take pride in my home. Replacing my plastic white coat hangers (you know the ones) made the entire closet feel classier. Very good quality and beautiful appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Slathered in Gravy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I've just received these so I can't comment on their longevity, but they are nice looking hangers and seem to be well made. I bought them for my coat closet and they look so much better than the hodge podge collection I had before. They are smooth but not slippery so the coats do not slide off. The hooks are not huge but fit the rod fine and go on and off easily.
customer_reviews.author: mysticdreamer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little things
customer_reviews.text: Love these nice wood hangers. More smooth and delicate than other cheaper wood hangers. A good price for such quality hangers. Very solid and sturdy. And get surprising non-slip stripes. Will order more.
customer_reviews.author: gunnerliao

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: These hangers were exactly what we were looking for to display shirts for our museum. They look spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK some quality control issues.
customer_reviews.text: Some broken out of the box (not a bunch, but still) and not in shipping. Very attractive but we'll see about longevity.
customer_reviews.author: mvportly

product_meta.title: JS HANGER Wooden Coat Hangers, 20 Pack High Grade 17.5 Inch Wood Suit Hangers With Non Slip Pant Bar - Extra Smooth and Splinter Free Walnut Finish
feature_bullets: Premium Quality Hangers - Made of 100% solid hardwood, hangers in a set of 20. Each wood hanger has a walnut finish, which accents the wood grain with gloss and adds the atmosphere of luxury and fashion to your closet. Versatile colors are matching with your home environment. Solid wood construction is heavy duty and durable to your clothes, even the heaviest one.

Slim Profile & Space Saving - Size: 17. 5" x 9. 4" x0. 5". Flat body design keeps your clothes in original shape and style maximizes your closet storage space. You will not be awkward about messy clothes as these hangers make your closet neat and tidy. Slim design is also elegant and is great decor to your wardrobe.
Non-slip Notches - Perfectly-cut notches along the hanger shoulder allows you to hang shoulder straps and also haves the function of non-slip. You will not worry about your clothes falling off.
360 degree rotating hooks - Designed with a chrome 360 degree anti-rust swivel hook, easy and flexible to access and convenient to steam your garment.

Useful round pants bar - Heavy duty with sturdy wooden round pants bar, you can efficiently hang all kinds of clothes with ease, such as suits, coats, jackets, trousers and so on. Wooden bar with grooved plastic cover makes it possible to hang suits and pants. The bar also prevents your clothes from slipping off and the plastic cover will leave no crease on your clothing.
